channel.title: self-introduction on naomori's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in self-introduction on naomori's Diary

item.title: 2020-08-17: some self-introduction patterns
item.description: Today, I’m going to start a English class of English coaching. I will have a self-introduction in English, so I’ll ready for it. Self-Introduction Tips and Tricks(with Examples) 1. Summarize your professional standing My name is Naoki Morita. I have a master’s degree in information science, and I’ve been working as a software engineer, especially related to network, for about 20 years. I work for hoge corporation, it’s an electric industrial company.

item.title: 2020-07-28: self introduction
item.description: Today, I’m going to have a English class of English school’s coaching. I might have a new English teacher of English school’s coaching, so I might have to introduce myself in the class. I want to be ready for it. Self-Introduction Tips and Tricks(with Examples) Draft a sample of what you want to say I want to say my name, my work, and the trigger to make me start learning general English in a class, also its reason and my current goal of learning English, too.
